alert.note: Alert for Nemaha; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 11:02PM CDT until June 07 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN NEMAHA AND RICHARDSON COUNTIES... At 1102 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rock Port to 7 miles east of Shubert to 2 miles northwest of Salem, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Falls City, Rulo, Verdon, Stella, Shubert, Nemaha, Dawson, Brownville, Salem, Preston, Barada, Sac and Fox Nation Reservation, Brownville State Recreation Area, Indian Cave State Park and Iowa Reservation of Kansas and Nebraska. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
